titles.title: A resolution repealing standing orders relating to flowers in the Senate Chamber.
A resolution repealing standing orders relating to flowers in the Senate Chamber.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution repeals a 1905 prohibition on flowers in the Senate chamber. Since 1923, flowers have been occasionally allowed in the chamber, primarily to honor deceased Senators.
